mapper.sql: a."ID" as "id" ,a."DOCUMENT_NO" as "documentNo" ,a."ITEM_NO" as "itemNo" ,a."TO_DEPT" as "toDept" ,a."LEND_DATE" as "lendDate" ,a."ITEM_CODE" as "itemCode" ,a."ITEM_NAME" as "itemName" ,a."ITEM_SPEC" as "itemSpec" ,a."LEND_AMOUNT" as "lendAmount" ,a."UNITS" as "units" ,a."RETURN_AMOUNT" as "returnAmount" ,a."RETURN_DATE" as "returnDate" ,a."RETURN_MAN" as "returnMan" ,a."RETURN_FLAG" as "returnFlag" ,a."OPERATOR" as "operator" ,a."LENDER" as "lender" ,a."MEMOS" as "memos" ,a."ANTI_FEE" as "antiFee" ,a."ANTI_FEE_SUM" as "antiFeeSum" ,a."ANTI_DATE" as "antiDate" ,a."EXP_DOCUMENT_NO" as "expDocumentNo" ,a."NOBACK_FEE" as "nobackFee" ,a."REQ_DATE" as "reqDate" ,a."REQ_OPERATOR" as "reqOperator" ,a."OPERATOR2" as "operator2" ,a."ORG_ID" as "orgId"
mapper.select:
SELECT ,nvl(s.amount,0) stock,d.dept_name toDeptName FROM ASEPSIS_LEND_REC a,(select sum(s.amount) amount,s.from_dept from asepsis_stock s,asepsis_dict d where s.item_code = d.asepsis_code and s.org_id=#{orgId} and (s.anti_date+d.valid_days) >= sysdate and s.document_no like 'T%' group by s.from_dept) s, (select distinct dept_code,dept_name from dept_dict where org_id = #{orgId}) d
a.org_id = #{orgId} and a.to_dept = d.dept_code and a.to_dept = s.from_dept(+) and (a.lend_amount is null or a.lend_amount != a.return_amount)
and a.return_date >= #{lendDateStart}
and #{lendDateEnd} >= a.return_date
and a.to_dept = #{toDept}
and instr(','||#{returnFlag}||',',','||a.return_flag||',')>0
order by a.to_dept
